resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81853</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81853</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5047</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Athletics - (7) Pair Relay</string>
            <string language="es">Atletismo – (7) Relevos</string>
            <string language="ga">Lúthchleasaíocht – (7) Rás Sealaíochta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Athletik - (7) Paar-Relais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Athlétisme - (7) Relais de Paire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Athletics - (7) Relé Do Par</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Atletismo - (7) Relè Di Accoppiamento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αθλητισμός - (7) ηλεκτρονόμος ζευγαριού</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson contains a warm-up and cool-down, throwing activities and running activities (sprinting and pair relay). It requires co-operation between children in practising the relay and in a warm-up game.</string>
            <string language="es">Esta lección contiene actividades de calentamiento, enfriamiento, lanzamientos y carreras (carreras de fondo y de relevos). La práctica del relevo requiere la cooperación entre los niños y un juego de calentamiento.</string>
            <string language="ga">Imlíníonn an ceacht seo téamh suas agus fuarú síos, gníomhaíochtaí caithimh agus rith (ráibeáil agus rás sealaíochta). Teastaíonn comhoibriú idir na leanaí i gcleachtadh an ráis sealaíochta agus sa chluiche téimh suas.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Physical Education</string>
            <string language="es">Educación física. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Corpoideachas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion enthält eine Vorwärmung und 
kühle-unten, werfende Aktivitäten und laufende Aktivitäten 
(Sprinten und Paarrelais). Sie benötigt Mitarbeit 
zwischen Kindern im Üben des Relais und in einem Vorwärmung Spiel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon contient un préchauffage et des 
activités fraîches-vers le bas et jetantes et des activités 
courantes (sprinting et relais de paire). Elle exige la 
coopération entre les enfants en pratiquant le relais et dans un jeu 
de préchauffage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição contem um warm-up e umas atividades 
frescas-para baixo, jogando e umas atividades running (sprinting e 
relé do par). Requer a cooperação entre crianças em praticar
o relé e em um jogo do warm-up.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione contiene un preriscaldamento e lle
attività fredde-giù e gettanti e lle attività correnti (sprinting e
relè di accoppiamento). Richiede la cooperazione fra i bambini 
nell'esercitarsi nel relè ed in un gioco di preriscaldamento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα περιέχει μια προθέρμανση και 
δροσερός-κατεβάζει, ρίχνοντας τις δραστηριότητες και τρέχοντας 
τις δραστηριότητες (να τρέξει γρήγορα και ζευγαριού 
ηλεκτρονόμος). Απαιτεί τη συνεργασία μεταξύ των παιδιών 
στην άσκηση του ηλεκτρονόμου και σε ένα παιχνίδι προθέρμανσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leibeserziehung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução Física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione Fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φυσική αγωγή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
